short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Tamil meanings easily while browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View Tamil meanings easily while browsing.
Double-click any word to view its Tamil definition in a pop-up.
Click on "மேலும் அர்த்தங்கள் →" in the pop-up to see complete definitions on a new tab. 
This extension uses results from 'Tamil Wiktionary' (https://ta.wiktionary.org/) website.
